Biography

ABOUT ME



Dr. George Mundanthanum is a board certified Orthopedic Surgeon who completed a fellowship in hand surgery. After completing his orthopedic residency at Baylor College of Medicine in Houston, Dr. Mundanthanam headed to Harvard University for his Hand fellowship at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center where he learned the latest techniques in Endoscopic carpal tunnel release as well as surgical management of complex hand injuries. He strives to provide excellent orthopedic hand care and be empathetic to his patients needs.
